ygData.subject: Optional locations
ygData.msgSnippet: So, let s go on the vague hint of beneath the waves . First I want someone to tell me what the gnome in the back of crushbone in the pit is for?  I was there
ygData.messageBody:
So, let's go on the vague hint of "beneath the waves".

First I want someone to tell me what the gnome in the back of crushbone in the
pit is for? I was there when I was in my teens, but have not returned to see
what he did.

Second I think most of us have cleared Ak'anon as a source for any tinkering
book.

Third, where else do we have to search on Fadwyr? Dagnors Cauldron (unlikely)
is the only other prodominant water based zone. Let's have a few teams scan it
to make sure we're not missing anything. Look for any doors or tunnels other
than kedge. Not likely much will be found. ButcherBlock also provides a edge
of water that technically could be used for tunnels, holes, and possible mobs.
Not likely however.

Then there is OOT. This zone is huge, and very un-used. I have searched most
of the aqua-goblin stand alone islands and I didn't see anything worthwhile
there. The Oracles isle is pretty much just some dwarven smiths, some goblins
(including one named goblin shaman that is red to me at 31st), and the oracle.
Most of us however haven't scanned under water to see if anything exists. I
think this is probably the most unexplored area and might be worth a gander.
Also when you say "waves" you usually mean ocean, not river or lake.

You have water in and under freeport, in oasis, in guk, everfrost, lakerathe,
eruds crossing, and kerra isle. So, we have a big journey ahead of us. Anyone
wanna start eliminating the possibilities?

-Kryogen Katpsaw
The almost completely fet-up with tinkering

=====
